attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The real reason for the numerous phone boxes on our pavements is not to serve the public (as today everyone has either a mobile or land-line phone), it is for media companies to profit form bill-board advertising on the side of the boxes. All phone boxes have a notice inside saying “if you would like to advertise your product with us contact us on…”
The media companies are turning a blind eye to the fact that these boxes have now become tools to display prostitution cards and a meeting point for drug dealers.
We demand the removal of all phone boxes that have become redundant for legitimate use.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
